Text.Page:
The mine here was abandoned for years, then someone started hiring miners again. Now I've heard that the {@LinkCreature:40#14#prion devastators} wear the same emblems as the mine bosses.

One way to find out is to kill a few of them. Message sent, information gathered...

Are you willing?
You've helped us find one piece of the puzzle, <PCNAME>. And nobody minds if you killed a few of those prion fellows in the meantime.
